item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, April 22, 2024 at 10:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. BlackRock steps up security for Larry Fink after ‘anti-woke’ backlash
2. Consulting firms step up efforts to push out their low performers
3.  Ukraine is the front line of a much larger conflict
4. Greece and Spain under pressure to provide Ukraine with air defence systems
5. FCA faces backlash over plan to ‘name and shame’ companies under investigation
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, April 22, 2024 at 10:25 AM UTC
